运行命令
=====================

.. click:: hfai.client.commands.hfai_python:python
   :prog: hai-cli python
   :nested: full

.. click:: hfai.client.commands.hfai_python:python
   :prog: hai-cli bash
   :nested: full

.. click:: hfai.client.commands.hfai_python:python
   :prog: hai-cli exec
   :nested: full

.. click:: hfai.client.commands.hfai_experiment:run
   :prog: hai-cli run
   :nested: full
